languages.text: "А чего ты ждал{mf||а}? Я долго взирала на то, как на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g} плодится беззаконная вольница, и вот, наконец, мне предоставился шанс положить ей конец. Взять за горло душегуба Владайма, принудить Футфол к покаянию и богобоязненности. Но тут {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}вмешал{mf|ся|ась}{/d} ты и ради банальной выгоды разрушил{mf||а} мой план".

traits.locale_text: "Отнюдь, я горячо приветствую, что теперь беззаконная вольница в секторе будет процветать не только под рукой Каллигоса, но и под твоей. Как можно гневаться на то, что ты помешал{mf||а} мне навести порядок в этом разбойничьем гнезде, Футфоле? Но не сомневайся, я продолжу очищение системы Фурибундус, пока пиратская скверна не будет искоренена".

languages.text: "Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}interfered{/d} and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."
languages.original_text: "А чего ты ждал{mf||а}? Я долго взирала на то, как на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g} плодится беззаконная вольница, и вот, наконец, мне предоставился шанс положить ей конец. Взять за горло душегуба Владайма, принудить Футфол к покаянию и богобоязненности. Но тут {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}вмешал{mf|ся|ась}{/d} ты и ради банальной выгоды разрушил{mf||а} мой план".

traits.locale_text: "Oh no, I greatly appreciate that the lawlessness in the sector will now flourish not only at Calligos's behest, but at yours as well. How can I possibly resent you for not letting me bring order to that den of outlaws, Footfall? But worry not, I will resume the cleansing of the Furibundus system until the pirate taint is exterminated."

"Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you interfered and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."

"Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you interfered and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."

"Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you interfered and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."

"Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you interfered and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."

languages.text: 「違う感想を期待したのか？私は無法者どもが{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}でのさばっているのを何年も見ていた。そしてようやく、奴らを根絶やしにするチャンスを得たのだ。あの悪党ヴラダイムの喉をつかみ、フットフォールに罪を償わせ、皇帝の恐ろしさを大衆に思い出させる機会を。だが、お前は月並みな利得目的で私の計画を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}妨げた{/d}上に台無しにしてくれたな」
languages.original_text: "Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}interfered{/d} and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."

traits.locale_text: 「違う感想を期待したのか？私は無法者どもが{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}でのさばっているのを何年も見ていた。そしてようやく、奴らを根絶やしにするチャンスを得たのだ。あの悪党ヴラダイムの喉をつかみ、フットフォールに罪を償わせ、皇帝の恐ろしさを大衆に思い出させる機会を。だが、お前は月並みな利得目的で私の計画を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}妨げた{/d}上に台無しにしてくれたな」

languages.text: “难道你还期待我能有什么别的态度？这么多年来，我亲眼看着{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的邪恶滋生蔓延，最终找到了机会结束这一切。我本可以扼住弗拉迪姆那个无赖的喉咙，对落脚港一直以来的罪恶进行清算，让人民重拾对神皇的敬畏。可你呢？你竟为了蝇头小利，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}毁了{/d}我的计划。”
languages.original_text: "Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}interfered{/d} and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."

traits.locale_text: “难道你还期待我能有什么别的态度？这么多年来，我亲眼看着{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的邪恶滋生蔓延，最终找到了机会结束这一切。我本可以扼住弗拉迪姆那个无赖的喉咙，对落脚港一直以来的罪恶进行清算，让人民重拾对神皇的敬畏。可你呢？你竟为了蝇头小利，毁了我的计划。”

languages.text: «¿Esperaba otra cosa? He observado durante años cómo los forajidos medraban en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, y por fin estaba a punto de poner fin a la situación. Iba a agarrar a ese matón de Vladaym por el cuello, obligar a Paso a expiar sus crímenes y devolver el miedo al Emperador a los corazones de sus gentes. Y usted tuvo que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}interferir{/d} y echar por tierra mis planes por algo tan banal como la riqueza».
languages.original_text: "Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}interfered{/d} and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."

traits.locale_text: «¿Esperaba otra cosa? He observado durante años cómo los forajidos medraban en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, y por fin estaba a punto de poner fin a la situación. Iba a agarrar a ese matón de Vladaym por el cuello, obligar a Paso a expiar sus crímenes y devolver el miedo al Emperador a los corazones de sus gentes. Y usted tuvo que interferir y echar por tierra mis planes por algo tan banal como la riqueza».

languages.text: « À quoi vous attendiez-vous d'autre ? Après des années à voir des bandits prospérer sur {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, j'avais enfin l'occasion d'y mettre un terme, de saisir Vladaym à la gorge et de forcer la station à se repentir en insufflant de nouveau dans le cœur du peuple la crainte de l'Empereur. Mais vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}interféré{/d} et réduit mes plans à néant pour une banale histoire de profits. »
languages.original_text: "Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}interfered{/d} and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."

traits.locale_text: « À quoi vous attendiez-vous d'autre ? Après des années à voir des bandits prospérer sur {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, j'avais enfin l'occasion d'y mettre un terme, de saisir Vladaym à la gorge et de forcer la station à se repentir en insufflant de nouveau dans le cœur du peuple la crainte de l'Empereur. Mais vous avez réduit mes plans à néant pour une banale histoire de profits. »

languages.text: "Habt Ihr etwas anderes erwartet? Jahrelang hatten Gesetzlose auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} ein schönes Leben, und endlich hatte ich eine Chance, dem ein Ende zu bereiten. Diesen Schurken Vladaym an der Gurgel zu packen, Footfall zur Buße zu zwingen und die Masse zu lehren, Ihn wieder zu fürchten. Aber Ihr musstet Euch {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}einmischen{/d} und meinen Plan zunichte machen für banalen Profit."
languages.original_text: "Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}interfered{/d} and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr etwas anderes erwartet? Jahrelang hatten Gesetzlose auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} ein schönes Leben, und endlich hatte ich eine Chance, dem ein Ende zu bereiten. Diesen Schurken Vladaym an der Gurgel zu packen, Footfall zur Buße zu zwingen und die Masse zu lehren, Ihn wieder zu fürchten. Aber Ihr musstet Euch einmischen und meinen Plan zunichte machen für banalen Profit."

languages.text: "Aksini mi bekliyordun? {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'da{/g} kanunsuzların serpilişini yıllar yılı izledim. Sonunda buna bir son verme, o eşkıya Vladaym'ı boğazından yakalama, Binliman'ı kefarete zorlama ve O'nun korkusunu halkın yüreğine tekrar sokma şansı buldum. Sense düpedüz kâr etme uğruna {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}yoluma taş koyup{/d} her şeyi mahvettin."
languages.original_text: "Did you expect any different? I watched for years as outlaws thrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, and then, at long last, I had a chance to put an end to it. To seize that thug Vladaym by the throat, to force Footfall to atone and put the fear of Him back into the masses. But you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}interfered{/d} and destroyed my plan for the sake of banal profit."

traits.locale_text: "Aksini mi bekliyordun? {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'da yıllar yılı izledim haydutların serpilmesini. Sonunda buna bir son verme, o eşkıya Vladaym'ı boğazından yakalama, Binliman'ı kefarete zorlama ve O'nun korkusunu halkın yüreğine tekrar sokma şansı buldum ama sen, düpedüz kâr etme uğruna yoluma taş koyup her şeyi mahvettin."
